mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM MA_CLASS_UI_FIELD A ORDER BY A.ROWAMOUNT,A.COLUMAMOUNT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_CLASS_UI_FIELD (GUID, UIGUID, FIELDGUID, DATASEQ, FIELDNAME, TITLE, SHOWTITLE, READONLY, FROZE, WIDTH, HEIGHT, ROWAMOUNT, COLUMAMOUNT, COLUMNSPAN, COLUMNNAME, NOTINHERIT, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, FORMAT, MANDATORY, SHOWVALWHENNOAUTH) VALUES (#GUID#, #UIGUID:VARCHAR#, #FIELDGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ:NUMBERIC#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SHOWTITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #READONLY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FROZE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #WIDTH:VARCHAR:NULL#, #HEIGHT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ROWAMOUNT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLUMAMOUNT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLUMNSPAN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #COLUMNNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #NOTINHERIT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FORMAT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MANDATORY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SHOWVALWHENNOAUTH:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MA_CLASS_UI_FIELD
UPDATETIME=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATEUSERGUID=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, TITLE=#TITLE#, SHOWTITLE=#SHOWTITLE#, READONLY=#READONLY#, FROZE=#FROZE#, WIDTH=#WIDTH#, HEIGHT=#HEIGHT#, ROWAMOUNT=#ROWAMOUNT#, COLUMAMOUNT=#COLUMAMOUNT#, COLUMNSPAN=#COLUMNSPAN#, NOTINHERIT=#NOTINHERIT#, FORMAT=#FORMAT#, MANDATORY=#MANDATORY#, SHOWVALWHENNOAUTH=#SHOWVALWHENNOAUTH#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
